description:
Hello,

In this tutorial you can find some crucial information and practical tips on how to put up your Photoshop (PSD), HTML or Wordpress theme on the world’s biggest theme market, Themeforest for sale.

The Introduction level of the course informs you about how to design Photoshop themes, how to code HTML designs and about the properties of the Wordpress themes in details.

In the last part of the course you will find some very important information on how to create help documents for your themes which are ready to be published. You will gain experience about which circumstances and conditions Themeforest rejects your theme and learn what to do to avoid rejection as well.

You will get crucial tips on increasing the sales of your published theme and learn advertisement fields in the market in addition to gaining very important information about how to make clients follow you on Themeforest.
title: How to Sell  Wordpress, HTML and PSD Themes on Themeforest
